abstracts.cdata!:
The three-year project would assist in
            developing improved technologies in food, fodder,
            horticulture and tree crop production in Azad Jammu and
            Kashmir; reinforce related line department management; and
            prepare a follow-up project to extend these improvements to
            farmers. The project would: establish four
            Experimental/Demonstration farms; implement pilot apple,
            vegetable seed and fresh vegetable schemes; initiate an
            improved system of fodder utilization and cattle-breed
            improvement; implement trials in fast growing fuelwood
            species and a pilot fuelwood plantations scheme; reinforce
            agricultural support services; finance an accelerated
            training program; and set up a management unit, with a land
            use and development planning section, to coordinate
            activities and prepare a follow-up project.
